1178590.name: Gods Of Fire
1178590.description:
An ancient war, forgotten by time, still rages in the skies as humanity’s greatest mistake echoes across a world of ash and ruin.
Humans played with forces they could not control, resurrecting dragons, experimenting on them, and trying to bend them into living weapons — until the dragons rebelled and civilization collapsed, leaving technology to fade into dust.

Only the dragons remained.

Now, as the last survivors of a fallen world, they battle for dominance over a realm consumed by fire and destruction, while humanity’s machines lie buried beneath ash and stone.

In a post-apocalyptic world where only the strongest survive, the fight for supremacy is far from over.

Welcome to Gods of Fire.

Epic Team Battles
Gods of Fire is a 5v5 dragon battle game where strategy, skill, and coordination decide victory.

Take flight across a forgotten world where civilizations have fallen, but the war never ended. Eliminate enemies and capture strategic bases to drain the enemy’s tickets while defending your own. Work with your squad, unleash your dragon’s abilities, and dominate the skies in a burning war for supremacy.

Burn your enemies, protect your base, and fight alongside your team for total aerial control.
Dragon CombatControl powerful dragons in competitive, high-speed 5v5 aerial battles. Master advanced flight mechanics, unleash fireballs and devastating breath attacks, and use unique dragon perks to gain the upper hand.

Command the skies with precision and use the environment to your advantage — from high-altitude ruins and wide-open skies to narrow passages perfect for ambushing your enemies.
Ticket-Based Warfare Each team begins with a limited number of tickets — the lifeline of your squad. Every elimination and captured base drains enemy tickets, while each defeat costs your team valuable points.

Matches are fast-paced and time-limited, ending when one side runs out of tickets or the clock reaches zero. To win, you must strike hard, defend your territory, and coordinate with your team to secure victory.

Dragons & Customization
Choose from different types of dragons, each with unique abilities, strengths, and weaknesses, allowing you to master your own playstyle.

Upgrade your dragon, unlock new cosmetic skins, and enhance its abilities to become even more powerful in battle. Equip special perks — powerful dragon abilities that can be activated during matches, from protective shields to toxic trails that damage enemies flying behind you.

Whether you favor precision, agility, or raw power, your dragon becomes a true reflection of your strategy and identity in the skies.
Key Features 

  • Epic 5v5 Dragon Battles – Compete in fast-paced, team-based aerial PvP where strategy and teamwork decide victory.

  • Ticket-Based System – Eliminate enemies and capture strategic points to drain the enemy team’s tickets before they drain yours.

  • Dragon Customization – Unlock cosmetic skins, upgrade abilities, and equip unique dragon perks to match your personal playstyle.

  • Consumable Battle Cards – Equip up to two cards per match to gain tactical advantages, such as temporary boosts or extra XP.

  • Loot Chests & Rewards – Open chests with keys to discover rare skins, consumables, XP boosts, gold, and GPoints.

  • Immersive Arenas – Fight across a post-apocalyptic world of fallen civilizations, from open skies and ruins to narrow passages perfect for ambushes.

  • Skill-Driven Gameplay – Victory comes from mastery, teamwork, and smart tactical decisions, not pay-to-win mechanics.


    Join the battle and claim your place among the dragons.
